title: Power Lily

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Produce one sun each night.
-Power up one other plant per night for 2 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Powered up plants get +1 defense
-If a powered up plant attacks, all attacks are upped by 1. For example, Chomper would be able to deal an Unstoppable attack to one player, and then spit them out to deal a Powerful attack to another player.
-Power up effects only last for the night the ability is used.
